message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLEPHONE_XFV_PHONETYPE_PHONENUMBER
message.locale: A phone number type must be specified when phone number is specified.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLEPHONE_XFV_PHONENUMBER_PHONETYPE
message.locale: A phone number must be specified when phone number type is specified.

message.name: ERR_CONCERN_FV_PHONE_EMPTY
message.locale: Phone number invalid. Phone number cannot be blank.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLEEPHONE_FV_DATE_PASSED
message.locale: The end date of the primary phone number must not be in the past.

message.name: ERR_PHONENUMBER_XFV_DUPLICATE
message.locale: The phone number "%1s" already exists for %2s.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLEPHONE_XFV_PHONENUMBER_PHONETYPE_EMPTY
message.locale: Phone details must contain both a phone number and a phone type.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLEPHONE_XFV_PHONEAREACODE_EMPTY
message.locale: A phone area code must be entered.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLEEPHONE_FV_NON_PRIMARY_DATE_PASSED
message.locale: The end date of the primary phone number has passed.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLEEPHONE_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_CREATE
message.locale: New phone details cannot be added for a client that is currently marked as a duplicate.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLEEPHONE_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_MODIFY
message.locale: Phone details of a client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_CONCERNROLEEPHONE_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_DELETE
message.locale: Phone details for a client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be deleted.
